text: my name is sorav sin I'm a senior
consultant for media for Wigan Prasad
which is a unit of the Department of
Science and Technology which is in turn
a part of the Ministry of Science and
Technology Government of India I was
brought in as a consultant to start the
whole process of launching a science
channel for India it was mandated from
the top that India with with a huge
youth population requires a science
channel of its own to disseminate
science content to build scientific
temper among you know the the
schoolchildren the youth and the public
at large it has never happened before in
the history of independent India that
the Government of India has launched a
television channel of its own and has
generated content on a day-to-day basis
like any other television channel we
launched the Science Channel in January
2019 and there are two legs to it one is
of course DTH which is called didi
science and one is the internet channel
which is an OTT which is called India
science it was about cloud from day one
we had to set up an infrastructure which
was ideally suited for the kind of
content that we were preparing with a
very high shelf life with a very high
possibility of ease of search and
discovery and of course for
frame-by-frame meta tagging etcetera so
that researchers students academics
professionals etcetera could find that
content at ease there are limitations to
what we are able to use the OTT platform
is running and of course sometimes we do
make use of the live coverage of events
etc we have Tata Communications as our
execution partner who in turn fall back
on AWS to give us the services that we
do we worked with them to understand the
requirement then work with the solution
architects from AWS to create a solution
which was apt for them today but also
would help them scale as they would
scale with the number of subscribers
watching these channels from
a vegan Prasad basically we've gone
online obviously the scale hat is yet to
come but what we have seen with them as
so far their adoption rate as good they
have not faced any problems when they
came on to AWS platform and they see
that it has a platform which is stable
from an availability perspective from a
performance which they want and looking
at the media of space get a viewers had
lot of reference customers where they
had done similar thing in India they had
done it for other channels basically and
that's something which was a good
reference case for our customer here and
that's that gave them confidence to work
on AWS platform and us managing that for
them and that's something which kind of
helped them to decide on eight of us and
telecommunication as as a managed
services partner and going forward as
the audience size goes up as the reach
goes up for the channel we are going to
keep adding resources at the AWS end to
give the audience a very seamless
experience
[Music]
